dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.ra.control.RevenueAssuranceConsequence
dataStructure.description:
An action taken if a RevenueAssuranceObjective is not met.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: RevenueAssuranceConsequence

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which an consequence is known and distinguished from other RevenueAssuranceConsequences.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail what the consequence is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: prescribedAction
child.description:
Recommended remedy for a violated RevenueAssuranceControl or RevenueAssuranceKPI.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: prescribedAction

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which a consequence applies.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: revenueAssuranceAssessmentItem
